name: Jnes Movie File
summary: Gameplay recording created by Jnes, an NES emulator for Windows; saves the state of the NES ROM ( .NES or .NSF file) as well as user inputs so that the exact gameplay can be replayed in the software; does not contain actual video data (i.e., no .AVI , .MP4 , etc. file); can be shared with other Jnes users, who can watch the replay in Jnes.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
